column3: $1. Heat the oven to 350 degrees. $2. Grease an 8-inch loaf pan. $3. In a large bowl
column6: salt and pepper. $4. In a separate bowl
column8: egg and milk. $5. Fold the wet mixture into the dry until just combined. Fold in the cheese and olives. $6. Scrape the batter into the loaf pan and smooth the top with a spatula. $7. Bake until golden and firm
column9: 40 minutes. Let bread cool in the pan for 5 minutes. 8. Run a knife around the edge of the pan and over turn onto a wire rack. $8. Cool 20 minutes before slicing and serving.
